Xiuhua Wang

Rm 725-726, SHB, CUHK · Hong Kong · (852) 62293531 · xhwang AT link DOT cuhk DOT edu DOT hk

I received my Ph.D. degree from the department of information engineering, the Chinese University of Hong Kong, under the supervision of Professor Sherman S.M. Chow in 2020. I received my master's degree from the department of computer science, the City University of Hong Kong in 2014.

Education Background

Publications

  • Xiuhua Wang, Sherman S.M. Chow. Cross-Domain Access Control Encryption: Arbitrary-policy, Constant-size, Efficient. IEEE S&P 2021.
  • Xiuhua Wang, Harry W.H. Wong, Sherman S.M. Chow. Access Control Encryption from Group Encryption. ACNS 2021.
  • Cong Zhang, David Cash, Xiuhua Wang, Xiaoqi Yu, Sherman S.M. Chow. Combiners for Chosen-Ciphertext Security. COCOON 2016.
  • Sherman S.M. Chow, Russell W.F. Lai, Xiuhua Wang, Yongjun Zhao. Privacy Preserving Credit System. NSS 2016.
  • Tao Zhang, Xiuhua Wang, Sherman S.M. Chow. Privacy-Preserving Multi-Pattern Matching. SecureComm 2016.

Research Interests

Advanced Encryption Notions, e.g.: Broadcast Encryption, Functional Encryption, Proxy Re-Encryption, etc.

Applied Cryptography, e.g.: Group Signatures, Privacy-Enhancing Technologies, Searchable Encryption, etc.
